mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_REVIEW (REVIEW_ID, P_ID, MEMBER_SERIAL, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_REGDATE, REVIEW_IMAGE) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_id}, #{member_serial}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE, #{review_image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM STORE_REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEW_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
